## Purchases.getOfferings() method

Fetch the configured offerings for this user. You can configure these in the RevenueCat dashboard.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOfferings(appUserId: string): Promise<Offerings>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  appUserId | string | Your app's user id in your system. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Offerings](./purchases-js.offerings.md)<!-- -->&gt;
